Text:
I will be seeding at about 100 kB/s for about a week, not that high but my bandwidth aint so great so its the best I can give you.

Also please seed after you finish downloading cause fuck yeah Berserk.
thanks bro this is one of my fav anime's of all time been wanting to read this for like 10 years
Anytime. Though I will only be seeding from about 3pm till 10 pm (UTC/GMT -5) because bandwidth...aint so great. Enjoy your pile of badassery.

One more thing, I know this sounds kinda weird coming from the uploader of this torrent but if any of you guys have any quality concerns, you should download the "Berserk Manga Vol. 1-36 + 37 (Incomplete)" torrent by Leve17en on this site. Its ultra high quality and arranged pretty nicely too.
